data.comment: The big names in today's match at Allianz Parque have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Palmeiras get the game underway.
In the minute 1, Palmeiras drives forward and Gabriel Menino gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Goias at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 3, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Goias throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
In the minute 9, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Gustavo Gomez heads in to make it 1-0 at Allianz Parque.
That's a fine assist from Gabriel Menino.
In the minute 21, Goias to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
Goias pushes forward through Douglas Baggio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 26, Goias's Victor Andrade gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Goias have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
In the minute 30, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Goias throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Goias drive forward through Daniel Bessa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 34, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Fabio Sanches (Goias) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goias close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Rafael Vaz.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Juan Pintado (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 44, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Goias.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 46, It's Goias with the kick-off after the break.
Goias to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 48, Palmeiras are coming forward and Luiz Adriano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Matias Vina returns to the field for Palmeiras after picking up a slight injury.
Goal kick for Goias at Allianz Parque.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Matias Vina.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Matias Vina is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 56, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Palmeiras make their first substitution with Lucas Lima replacing Ramires.
In the minute 59, Diogo Barbosa (Palmeiras) has replaced the possibly injured Matias Vina.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a third substitution, with Rony replacing Willian.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras attack through Diogo Barbosa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 63, Luiz Gustavo for Goias has been booked by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior and receives a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Juan Pintado with Rodrigues. This is the first substitution made today by Ney Franco.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Goias at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Gabriel Menino with Bruno Henrique.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's fifth substitution at Allianz Parque with Wesley replacing Ze Rafael.
Zeca is replacing Marcinho for Goias at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 72, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 74, Luiz Gustavo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Palmeiras's Matias Vina is back in action after a slight knock.
Goias’s Luiz Gustavo is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 76, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 81, Palmeiras's Bruno Henrique misses with an attempt on goal.
Goias have a goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 85, Douglas Baggio for Goias drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Goias.
In the minute 86, Palmeiras are pushing forward but Luan Garcia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Daniel Bessa (Goias) has received a yellow card from Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 88, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Palmeiras.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Goal kick for Goias at Allianz Parque.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
At Allianz Parque the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Zeca for Goias is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Goias have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras push forward at Allianz Parque and Rony gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Goias defence.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
That's full-time at Allianz Parque. The final score is 1-1.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior waits before resuming play because Zeca for Goias is still down.
Ney Franco is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Parque with Daniel replacing Victor Andrade.
